profile.name: ActiveMQ Classic
profile.description:
Use this profile to connect to Apache ActiveMQ Classic.
IMPORTANT: This profile requires ActiveMQ Classic 5.x client libraries (javax.jms namespace).
Required JARs (version 5.19.1): activemq-client-5.19.1.jar hawtbuf-1.11.jar jta-1.1.jar
The 5.x client is compatible with both ActiveMQ Classic 5.x and 6.x servers via the OpenWire protocol.
Supported features: - JMX-based broker connection - Queue and topic browsing - Message sending and receiving - Full JMS message type support
Connection URL format: service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://<host>:<port>/jmxrmi
DOCKER USERS: Message Manager automatically detects Docker container hostnames and retries with host.docker.internal - no manual configuration required!
